verbose_text: Fusion of the 84 N-terminal amino acids of TGB1 to GFP caused the GFP to accumulate in the nucleolus but not on MT and alanine substitutions of basic residues in this region in the TGB1 fusion protein also abolished nucleolar accumulation of the mutant YFP TGB1 (unpublished results).
evidence: GFP to accumulate in the nucleolus but not on MT and alanine substitutions of basic residues in this region in the TGB1 fusion protein also abolished nucleolar accumulation of the mutant YFP-TGB1
